attributes.action: Put pressure on Israel and Iran equally not to have nuclear weapons
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We petition the Prime Minister to do his utmost to stop the nuclear arms race in the Middle East. This includes encouraging Israel to abandon its nuclear weapons, as well as putting pressure on Iran not to develop them. It is hypocritical to allow one country to have them, yet stop a near neighbour from doing likewise.
